name: Parchive Recovery Volume
summary: Learn about .P19 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To open a P19 file in QuickPar, click "Open," navigate to your file, and click Open.
Parchive recovery volumes are named with ascending number extensions, e.g., .P01, P02, P03, P04, etc.
NOTE: The .PAR and .PAR2 extensions are used for files created with Parchive version 1 and 2 respectively.

description: Recovery volume used by QuickPar, a parchive (parity archive) volume creating utility; contains a parity volume in PAR1 format; may be referenced to perform data integrity checks on files or recover a file archive when one of the files in the archive is lost.
